Unplanned visual content changes detecte.Action: Implement file integrity monitoring on web server directories. Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for modifications to web content files. Analyze web server logs and Zeek http.log for unusual write requests or uploads to web directories. Use time series analysis to detect sudden spikes in file modification events or unusual traffic patterns to content directories.

Application logs showing abnormal behavi.Action: Monitor web application logs and Zeek http.log for patterns indicative of common web exploitation techniques (e.g., SQL injection attempts, cross-site scripting, directory traversal) not filtered by WAF. Analyze request entropy for unusual or highly complex inputs in parameters or URIs. Perform correlation analysis between failed web requests and subsequent suspicious activity.
